collectible.title: Bloom and Doom's Anti-Zombie Gardening Kit
collectible.subtitle: All you need to set up your zombie-repellent lawn!
collectible.text: A starter kit for your own homegrown lawn defense against the zombie hordes. It has a couple of seeds, useful information, and a QR code to acquire more plants.
